website_summaries.verdict: Though the plastic could be thicker, the pieces are reasonably sturdy, and this inexpensive, large set is perfect for groups of toddlers.
pros: A large, colorful set that includes five plates, five bowls, and five cups
Free of harmful chemicals including BPA
Can be washed on the top rack of the dishwasher
cons: The plastic is on the thin side, and the plates are prone to scratches, especially if you cut food on them

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and did not gain wear from dishwasher cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pack for my 12 month old twins. They are good quality thick plastic that is BPA free. My twins have not used them yet themselves as they are still in the throwing phase but I use the bowls to mix yogurt and the plates to serve their blueberries, etc. I mostly wash them by hand as I use them multiple times per day but I have run them through the dishwasher and they did not appear to gain more wear from it. These were a great deal and should last for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Great set for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: They are clearly made for toddlers, not sure why people are complaining about the size. They are perfect for our toddler, dishwasher top shelf safe and microwave safe for short times. The cute design is on the back of the plates and shows through so you don't destroy it when cutting things up on the plate. You do have to use lighter pressure when cutting things as it will leave marks on the plate.
customer_reviews.author: IDesign

customer_reviews.title: Not heat safe, starts flaking
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is not safe for microwave or dishwasher use as it starts peeling. Even the cups that have never had anything hot in them and washed on the top rack of the dishwasher started peeling inside. They are sturdy and my son really liked them, but I had to throw them away after a few months of regular use because of the plastic flaking off. Ended up getting silicone bowls and plates and they are much better more durable.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: This set is fantastic for the price. I got them for my toddler and he can easily carry them around when needed. They are quite aerodynamic when he throws them off his high chair as well. They've held up through many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S

customer_reviews.title: Best set of dishes for all ages of children!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this product in our house! So much that I recently ordered my third set. They are very durable and easy to use for my toddler and 8 year old. Very easy to clean and are dishwasher safe. I would highly recommend if you are looking for everyday dishes for your kids!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue blues
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent kids' dish set and it has held up well so far (we've had it for 6 months). No problems in the dishwasher on the top or bottom racks. The one complaint I have (which others have addressed and which is why I gave this 3 stars) is that the colorful picture is misleading (at least for some of us) as our set did not include any blue dishes. We received one red, one yellow, one green, and two orange of each item. I would have preferred to have the blue instead of two oranges. But overall a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A.

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this set. I thought it might be cheap and disposable, but it has held up to daily use and dishwashing just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: The cups are a little small for the dishwasher and tend to flip if not held down by something else, but I love these plates and have bought several sets over the years. We don't cut on them because that's what causes issues with plastic (switched to all bamboo cutting boards, too), but these hold up great, don't break, wash clean and the kids love them. I'm actually even really glad they quit the blue and pink plates, because there was too much fighting over plate color in our house. Now everyone gets bright happy colors.
customer_reviews.author: PersonA

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, perect feeding set.
customer_reviews.text: I love this feeding set. It’s inexpensive and comes with everything you need for your baby meals. I like how there are multiple items for each product, so I am never out of anything. They clean easily and I usually just stick them on the top rack of the dishwasher. I have also used it in the microwave for quickly warming up food. The only con is that the bowls have a weird shape to them and because of that you can’t put any kind of lid to cover/close it. I usually use saran wrap, but it would be nice if they were shaped more like traditional bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Latehmocha

customer_reviews.title: Great little set of dishes, glasses and bowls
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set of little plastic dishes. They are BPA free which is what we should all look for nowadays when buying plastics to eat or drink from. They are also dishwasher safe. They say to put them on top shelf but I have actually put them on the bottom and voila! they are just fine. I have grand kids and thought I'd only use them when they are here but I use them almost every day for myself because they are easy to grab and put a sandwich on and the cups are super for a small glass of milk or juice. The bowls are great for a few scoops of ice cream. Wonderful dish set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Pangborn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We like these plates, bowls and cups for our 2 and 4 year olds. We had bought a bunch of the disney type plates and bowls - which of course the kids like - but that plastic at the bottom of them is coming off after just a few washes in the dishwasher - despite being put on the top rack only. These appear MUCH safer and we feel a lot better about using these. They are also top rack safe only which isn't an issue. The kids don't seem to miss the others and this is really all they need.
customer_reviews.author: heatherb

customer_reviews.title: works for basic plastic plates.
customer_reviews.text: Holds up just like I would expect any plastic set to work. I prefer the nonslip bowls for infant and toddler feeding though!
customer_reviews.author: CasRy

customer_reviews.title: A mom's "must have"
customer_reviews.text: I have always believed in having separate wares for my kid which will help him recognize when I am preparing his meals and these brightly colored ones are quite the pick for me. Reasonably priced, Perfect size, bright colors, SHATTER PROOF. What more could a parent ask for? I would definitely recommend these to any parent in search of kiddie wares. Note however, the plates aren't the best for "mashing" in as the bottoms are somewhat curved so they tend to pop/bounce (and I don't mean pop as in "break") if you were to try crushing stuff on them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos De Cunha

customer_reviews.title: These is an awesome beginner set for children
customer_reviews.text: These is an awesome beginner set for children. The cups are very small so not too difficult to use. I have a two year old, and an eight month old. The bowls are perfect size for toddler portions, while still being perfect to feed my baby pureed foods. The bowl has a slight slant to it which makes it much easier for toddlers to feed and for me to scoop up purees for my baby. Overall, I am very happy with my purchase, and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: PrincessFarrah

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetic & functional
customer_reviews.text: Often with kids' stuff, it's cute, OR it's useful, but not both at the same time. These dishes fill the bill on both counts. Bright, colorful, fishies (what kid doesn't like fishies?). Unisex, so I can use them for both my daughter and my sons. Durable, the glasses are very stable (though not impossible to tip over, I don't recommend filling them more than halfway), and both microwave and dishwasher safe. My single beef is that the bowls-- for some reason, only the bowls-- are difficult to watch to squeaky clean-- they always feel a bit greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Don't put in the microwave the longer than 30 seconds. They will melt
customer_reviews.text: Can't put them in the microwave for more than 30 to 40 seconds otherwise they melt. Other than that they're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jana h.

customer_reviews.title: Such a great price for this set
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price for this set!! I can't seem to find the plates in the store anymore, and I wanted to get new ones since I ruined mine in the microwave and with a knife cutting up food . (They can be put in there but only for a few seconds to quickly heat something. Otherwise, they'll get white marks on them.) I'm happy with this purchase, and my oldest son loves the fish design. They also hold up nicely in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA

customer_reviews.title: Great find for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect! We have 3 boys and we go through dishes like crazy. I will buy this set again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These are simple and useful. The colors are nice and bright, and fairly unisex. The fish design on the pieces is cute and the kids seem to like them. These plates are not as good as the old design - they are flatter and do not have an edge on them. This makes them easier to clean, but it is much easier for kids to scoop food off the edge of the plate since there is nothing there to stop it. The older version of these plates had a band around the edge in a contrasting color that would help. Still, a nice set and a nice value. My kids use these every day.
customer_reviews.author: PT Mama

customer_reviews.title: These are great and very cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great and very cute. I did not read close enough when I bought them to see that they are only top rack dishwasher safe. That is a little annoying, but hopefully I remember to put them on the top with every use because I don't want to ruin them!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use only the bowls in this set so far. My baby is just over a year. The cups are just too large for her at this point. She's not really using open cups yet, so that's fine, but I think they should be smaller. The are MUCH larger than the cups they have at my child's daycare. The plates are OK, too, but a little advanced for the stage my baby is at. I suppose for an older child, this set is nice. The items hold up in the dishwasher and seem of high quality and sturdy. I'm keeping everything, but if I had it to do over I would just get the bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Charity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: After searching everywhere for a kid proof feeding set, I finally found this one by Munchkin. I've used different parts before, especially ones with the cute drawings and cartoon characters, but they don't hold up to daily toddler use; not to mention the questionable quality of the materials. So far, my 2 and a half year old toddler users them with ease. The size is perfect for their smaller servings, and the fact that it's microwave safe and BPA free means it's perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great set. The cups are the perfect size for my two year old who is still getting the hang of drinking without a lid. I don't ever fill them more than half way though since she tends to hurriedly tip her glass and pour it on herself. Plates and bowls work just fine too, and have held up to microwaving, going through the dishwasher, and even some light cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microwave safe, but not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: While this says it's microwave safe that likely refers to the fact that it will not leak harmful chemicals into your food (don't get me wrong, this is a very good and very important thing). However, actually microwaving food in these has left marks in the plastic around the edges or "hot spots" (which really is not that hot, as I'm merely warming meals for a 2 year old). It's a good cheap set though, and I would buy it again. Just wish that they didn't claim microwave safe if you can't do so without ruining the dish.
customer_reviews.author: Julie N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I bought these for my 1 1/2 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought these for my 1 1/2 year old daughter and 3 year old son. They love it!! I would say the serving size of cup and bowl are more so suited for my 1 1/2 year old, but my 3 year old still loves it. They all have cute fish prints on them and are gender neutral tones. My biggest joy was that they are machine wash safe! I have washed them now a lot and they still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for toddlers. We've purchased 2 sets of these because we use them daily (and kept running out before the dishwasher was ready to be run). They show knife marks if you cut food on them, but that's to be expected. Otherwise they hold up really well. Ours have been run through the dishwasher MANY times (top rack) and haven't warped, cracked, or faded yet.
customer_reviews.author: MHollaBack

customer_reviews.title: Cute set!
customer_reviews.text: The set came in the original munchkin Packaging. Is a little difficult to open, but nothing scissors couldn't tackle! I love the colors, although I wish there weren't two of the same color in all of the sets. It is a super cute print. My toddler loves them! We use these all of the time! I will probably buy more so we don't have to keep watching the same ones every single day!
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my toddler son and it is great! When I recieved my order, I realized one of my cups had a small piece of something embedded in it. I called customer service and they were wonderful, they sent an additional set of cups and bowls! They have held up well after 6 months of dishwashing and use. My son loves saying the color of his plate/bowl/cup at each meal. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love munchkin brand and this deal on the plates bowls and cups was amazing!! I bought 2 and would always buy again
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: These have been the best kid plates I've used over the last 4 years
customer_reviews.text: These have been the best kid plates I've used over the last 4 years. Our set had 2 orange, 1 red, 1 green, & 1 yellow, so completely gender neutral. My clumsy kids don't easily tip these cups, and the bowls are deep enough to hold a decent serving without spilling. My set is labeled microwave safe and I use them daily without any concerns. They are easy to clean; I love that they aren't divided as it makes hand washing much easier. I doubt I'll ever buy a different kind of kid dinnerware unless they stop making these. They'd be a perfect baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: 2beagles

customer_reviews.title: Small children feel special using this feeding set
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect "dining" set for toddlers and preschoolers. We have been using the set for nearly 3 years, with very minimal wear. Everything is dishwasher safe, yet easy to clean by hand as well. And the price is hard to beat as well. My kids especially like how colorful the set is and enjoy choosing which color plate, bowl or cup they would like to use at each meal. In fact, they prefer this set to any other kids dishware we've purchased over the years.
customer_reviews.author: LadyA

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love all the different colors, the cups are perfect size for a drink for toddlers and teaching them how to use a real cup over sippy cups. They aren't really see through as the picture suggests...but still cute! :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Popejoy

customer_reviews.title: Good dishes for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my three year old and she loves the colors. I've microwaved them and put them through the dishwasher and they've come out just fine, no warping or anything. I do tend to hand wash them, though, as the cups and bowls are so light weight that they flip over in the dishwasher. I'll buy them again if they wear out on us while she's still small enough to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!!
customer_reviews.text: These plates, bowls and cups are awesome!! I bought these three years ago and have three kids 5 and under using them on a daily basis and they are holding up well. We can throw them on the top shelf of the washer and no harm comes to them. These are really a great set for kids. I recommend buying another set of plates, they get used faster than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: I really like that this set has plates with no dividers
customer_reviews.text: We are working on transitioning my toddler son to more "grown-up" dinnerware. I really like that this set has plates with no dividers, cups with no lids, and bowls that are a larger size. However, it is still plastic, and therefore very toddler-friendly. I think that the plastic is actually more durable than the melamine that he had in some of his divided plates. Very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good price. Our son is just starting solids and doesn't need the plates but the price for the whole set is better than buying each individually. We use the cups with him and help him drink water mostly because we don't want him to get hooked on sippy cups. The cups are a great size for little hands. They wash perfectly in the top rack. Our son loves the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: These are the best dishes for toddlers and take up very little cabinet ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dishes for toddlers and take up very little cabinet space (can't stand all of the space the divided trays take up and didn't want my kids used to food always being divided since that isn't necessarily how it happens in a restaurant or real life). Bowls are perfect for oatmeal or toddler size cereal. We don't use the cups much for drinking but instead use as cheerio or snack cups.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great value. This is made of a nice durable plastic. It is thick and holds up well being tossed on the hard floor and repeatedly ran through the dishwasher. I've cut my daughters meals up on these places using my expensive steak knives and they haven't left any cut marks on the plates. My favorite part is these dishes even though they are plastic they do not get stained by dark or red foods they wash up perfectly. I plan to purchase another set very soon.
customer_reviews.author: SeanHouston

customer_reviews.title: these aregreat
customer_reviews.text: these are great dishes however would like it to be micrawavable. i think the plates are but i still dont trust puttin them into the microwave. have saved alot since we use to only have glass dishes he broke a couple on the kitchen floor since he likes to throw after hes done eating now i dont worry bout him throwing these....though hes learning not to throw now that hes getting older. lol
customer_reviews.author: Cookiemama

customer_reviews.title: These have been great for my little girl
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for my little girl. We have used them for about a year now. I microwave and put them in the dishwasher all the time and they still look like new. The bowls are deep which helps as she is eating things like yogurt or apple sauce. The spoons are easy for her to hold and maneuver. Great product. I will buy more if I ever need to, but again, todo far they have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2lee

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Proof
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher and Microwave safe, fun colors, and my 21 month olds feel like BIG kids drinking from their not too big big kid cups (so when they spill, it's only a tiny mess!). So far, I really like this set - it's perfect - they stack and store nicely and are just the right size for our toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: erin brianne

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids! very convenient size. If you are serving greasy food, you have to use a lot of dish washing soap to get rid of a "film" but great in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Menzel

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great set. These plates, bowls and cups are great. They are dishwasher safe, my little one loves to dump his food off of them and throw them around. We tried the kind with suction cups on the bottom and they never stuck to his tray. I figure if he's going to be dumping them over anyways, might as well have cute plates and bowls to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Cups are the best part
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I saw they were on super sale and we needed some more kidsware. They are decent enough for cutting fruit on or putting cheerios in the bowl, but I would not warm anything up on them. The plates and bowls are super thin and won't last forever. The cups seem a bit thicker and have been nice to use at dinner to teach our son how to drink out of a reg cup vs sippy cup!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Love and Reccomended!
customer_reviews.text: I used prime and it arrived 2 days later which was nice. as an online shopper skeptic I wasn't sure what to expect quality wise but I must say I am Impressed! great quality, love the fish designs as well (comes on plate cups and bowls). My daughter Is 2 and she adores her munchkin cups :-) all in all smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. It was her first "big girl set ". We purchased them almost a year ago and they are still going strong and my daughter still loves them and uses them every day.They are good quality, it gives a good amount of each and they really hold up. I would not hesitate to buy this set again when our set has to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These plates are very well made and are perfect for my 19 month old to use during meals. I love that I don't have to worry about my good plates and bowls breaking and know that these are the perfect size for her. The colors are fantastic and I love that all of the pieces have a color that goes together, for those who like to be matchy matchy.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: This feeding set was perfect for my granddaughter and nieces and nephews when they ...
customer_reviews.text: This feeding set was perfect for my granddaughter and nieces and nephews when they visit. They are lightweight yet sturdy. They nestle together well enough to not take up too much space in the cupboard too!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Woods Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love having their own sized dinnerware. The colors are also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Grace888

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and cute
customer_reviews.text: I just needed something that would last the years with my 1 year old and 4 year old sharing these. They are pretty colors for the girls, and just the right sizes, and fun for them to use as well. just wish they came with utensils, but cant mark down because of that because they do their job and I like them as a mom. and you can wash them in the dishwasher but top rack.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they were such a great price for this many items. My daughter loves these. She loves using the little cups, they make her feel like she's just like the big kids when she uses her cup. These are also great that they just pop right into the dishwasher and you never have to worry about the little designs melting off, or peeling. I definitly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy to 3 Boys_1 Girl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend this set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these plates for my daughter at about 8 months and I think I'll use them for a long time! I love the size of each of the pieces and they are good quality, sturdy enough to take a few bumps from a playful baby. I love the bright colors and that you get 5 of each piece. I tend to hand wash my dishes, but I like that they are dishwasher safe. Definitely would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: MV SLC

customer_reviews.title: Bought Again!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I have purchased. I used these for my first as a toddler, now using for my second. The colors have changed over the years, but not the quality. Microwave safe, dishwasher safe, and most importantly, TODDLER SAFE! They are tough and work great for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Schnerphel

customer_reviews.title: They're great and we wash them on the top rack and ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for my son, he's only 8 months now though so we really just use the bowls for ourselves haha. They're great and we wash them on the top rack and have not changed a bit in color or size or anything crazy like that.
customer_reviews.author: KC2011

customer_reviews.title: Through 2 kids and going strong
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and well built. I've had 2 children that used them and they have upheld well. They withstand the occasional drop from the high chair, or the intentional throw. Top rack, dishwasher safe. I've microwaved some food on the plates but not for very long. I fear the plates will warp. The variety in color helps them appeal to both girls and boys.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Rasband

customer_reviews.title: Good option for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of all these plates. Good colors too
customer_reviews.author: Monitita

customer_reviews.title: Pretty set
customer_reviews.text: This feeding set is so colorful. They're adorable! My daughter loves them. Only complaint is that grease can stick to it so I have to double/triple wash sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: B.Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this set a couple of times and plan to purchase them again. They work great for my two kids, we use them for all their meals. They are fun colors and sturdy. I like that I dont feel bad about tossing them out when they start to show their use. We use them in the microwave and dishwasher so they dont last forever but I would not expect them to.
customer_reviews.author: Liz E

customer_reviews.title: I just don't like how the plates get easily scratched
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick for my toddler and washes well in the dishwasher. I just don't like how the plates get easily scratched. It's only temporary though!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissi G

customer_reviews.title: Great so far,
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bc the plastic type are always breaking. I have twin 3 yr olds and was looking for small cups and plates and bowls that if dropped wouldn't break. The plates are onthe small side, but they work fine for now. My ony real complaint is I wish the plates and bowls had 5 different colors like the cups have so there would be complete matching sets.
customer_reviews.author: Marymomof3

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and value for the money! My daughter LOVES the fish design on the product. I would make two changes: the plates are a little on the small side so I would make them bigger and include dividers. Other than that, the set is great. We are debating about getting a second set since they are so useful.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: I love these plates for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love these plates for my daughter. I use them as every day plates. Even though they are microwave safe they will melt and warp after using them after awhile. These are my second set and ill keep ordering when needed. Last set lasted me almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia V

customer_reviews.title: No no for microwave
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work for the microwave like it says. The plastic turns bad even though I put it for 20 seconds ..
customer_reviews.author: Yaima

customer_reviews.title: ... still 2 and now she's 3 and they've been great. I would advise this set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter while she was still 2 and now she's 3 and they've been great. I would advise this set of bowls, cups, and plates to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Girdner

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler dining set
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Cups, plates, and bowls are the perfect size for my 3 year old. Great price for everything that you get in the package. Wish they were top and bottom self dishwasher safe, but being top-self dishwasher safe still means I can put them in the dishwasher, so I am happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Js Mom

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these dishes! They are the perfect size for toddlers. The cups are the perfect transition size between sippy cups and regular cups, in addition, the plates and bowls are just the right size for little ones. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: If you love IKEA dishes you will love these
customer_reviews.text: I love the IKEA dishes but they are just too pricey and difficult to find in the store. I ordered one package of these to try out and love them so I ordered several more sets. I three children from ages 2-7 and they use them for every meal. Much cuter than the IDEA dishes also (fish design). The cups are the exact size as the IKEA brand.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeFan

customer_reviews.title: A good set of dishes for the baby.
customer_reviews.text: A good set of dishes for the baby. They fit well with any food, wash well and is not broken, do not crack if the child is younger throw them. We used them over 1.5 years, and they like new. Kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maryana

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for rough edges
customer_reviews.text: My toddler really likes this product. Dishwasher safe and eye-pleasing. I had to send back the first set though because the edges on the glasses were very rough and could have cut the baby's lips. I received a prompt replacement. Must have been a defective set. Just look out and feel them before giving to the little one.
customer_reviews.author: GAMS Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Better than Ikea.
customer_reviews.text: I read about the fish pattern embossed on these pieces. Makes me wish these were available in adult sizes. The bowls and plates are microwaveable. The cups are not. All load in upper rack of my dishwasher easily. Our toddlers love them. Great set and good value, perfect for Grandma's or home.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: Simple but effective for out 21 month old. It'll be great as she continues to grow and she loves the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good, but scratch easily...
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for a while now and they are great. Strong, durable, and kids like the bright colors. They do scratch easily if you cut food on them with a knife. Pre-cut your kids food on a different plate so you don't scratch up the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Raby

customer_reviews.title: just right for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowls. I like how they go up on the sides- seems to help when they are learning to get things out of bowls. The cups are perfect for learning to drink out of real cup. The plates are small for dinner, but work fine for smaller meals. Really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: coriboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers. Size is small (plate is about the size of a desert plate) but bowls are deep. Very easy to clean and durable. A great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ailish

customer_reviews.title: awesome for kids
customer_reviews.text: my kids love the colors and the sizes are perfect for their portions. very durable and solid. been using for 1+ yrs and still going strong and looking new. I put in dishwasher top shelf without problems. I avoid microwave though. I trust these more the laminated cups/plates from a safety standpoint.
customer_reviews.author: penlight

customer_reviews.title: They are fairly small and I prefer sectioned plates for my daughter that are more sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these as much as I thought we would. They are fairly small and I prefer sectioned plates for my daughter that are more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They are microwaveable and BPA free
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are microwaveable and BPA free! I not only use this for our toddler, but also for travels to hotels and picnics! Very flexible to our overall needs!
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little plates, bowls & cups! They are very easy to wash & have held up really well! My kids love all the colors and the small portions are great for little meals & snacks for little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Really cute set and so much easier with my two year old. She has a habit of throwing them off the table once she's done eating. The bowls have a different shape to them that seem to make it easier for her to hold. All are dishwasher safe and easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: kisha rountree

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. It is cheaper to buy this set rather than buy dishes individually. Cups are the perfect size for little hands and the bowls have a unique rim to help prevent spills. Have washed these in the dishwasher (top rack) with no problems. Fun colors for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Heather82

customer_reviews.title: munchkin stuff!
customer_reviews.text: They are so much cuter in person than in the photo. I don't understand why they give you two oranges instead of one blue? That is really my only complaint otherwise these are adorable and I love all of the munchkin stuff!
customer_reviews.author: makoslisa

customer_reviews.title: Munchkin Set
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and fun colors for little ones. My only complaint, being the picky person that I am, would be that the color sets are not the same. The bowls I received were all pretty much the same colors; the plates and cups were a matching color variety, but the bowls don't match. I know, I know, a little OCD. Regardless, these are sure to last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for a toddler/preschooler. The colors are vibrant and the fishy design is exciting for the kids. The cups are perfect. My only complaint is that the bowls and plates are a little on the small side. So if you're looking for a deeper bowl or "dinner size" plate, then you should skip this set. If you're getting it in conjunction with other plates/bowls that are bigger, then this is a perfect addition to that. Also, I love that they can go in the dishwasher & they're BPA free!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherC

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Best set of toddler dishes I have bought. They stand up well to all the food cutting, dishwashing, and trauma that the toddlers throw at them. We have 2 year old toddlers and have been using these for well over a year and a half. The kids love them and they have not cracked or broken! Still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: mysticalfaery

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the cups and bowls but the plates are a bit small. I thought they would be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Obirek

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about these is that they are dishwasher safe, makes clean up a lot easier! Plus, I don't have to worry about them breaking when they're dropped by the 2 year old. Stack nicely to store in smaller spaces
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kubiszewski

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had lids. Great Product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Our kiddos love the bright colors. They stack easily and don't take up a ton of cupboard or dishwasher space. I only wish the cups had lids. The base is heavier, so they don't spill easily, but lids would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob and Kiki HantlaTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: great size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for our son so he would have his own little plates and cups to use. They are the perfect size for little hands. He has now learned to drink from a cup so much better!
customer_reviews.author: lsp0605

customer_reviews.title: Great Package
customer_reviews.text: Not much to complain about. Easy to clean, they can be microwaved and put in the dish washer, which is a nice benefit. The cups are a little small, but we like to use them at bed time and for teeth brushing anyways, so no big deal for us. Great set and fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great dish set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set for I purchased for my one year old son. The plates are a great size and he is easily able to drink out of the little cups. The bowls are a great size. They are sturdy and hold up well in the dishwasher and to everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite dishes for baby and toddler
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite dishes for baby and toddler. They don't have any goofy dividers and nest well. I feel like baby stuff invaded my cupboards and wanted everything to be one size and able to nest in order to save room for adult dishes too. I got these and threw everything else out.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 3 year old. Good quality; plastic holds up to multiple washings in the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ann Dinkelo

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to keep at the grandparents house. They love it because they don't take up a lot of room in their cabinets. My kids like having their own plates. They even picked out their own colors so they could keep track of who's snack is who's.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Moore

customer_reviews.title: She loved them. Nice bright colors and a good buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grand daughter for Christmas to put in her picnic baskets. She loved them. Nice bright colors and a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Carrow

customer_reviews.title: functional
customer_reviews.text: These are good dishes. My daughter seems to like them and they are standing up to her playing with them. the only thing is they re very light wieght so it is very easy for her to pick them up and flip them over, but that seems to be an issue with all dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Architecture Bunny

customer_reviews.title: These have worked great. They are surviving my dishwasher nicely
customer_reviews.text: I needed some uniform sized plates and cups, to move beyond the kiddo plates that are sized all different. These have worked great. They are surviving my dishwasher nicely, too.
customer_reviews.author: Director

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cute feeding set. The materials are thick and look sturdy. Love the fish pattern. Dishwasher and microwave safe (cups are not microwave safe). I wish they come with more colour variation in the set (some are repeat colours). Cutest available in the market (compared to similar products).
customer_reviews.author: DD009

customer_reviews.title: Great feeding set!!! Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these dishes! The colors are bright and unisex. They are made of strong plastic so they are very durable but also cute! I orderd the bowls first and loved them so much I order this 15 piece set! The plates are the size of our small plates that came with our (grown-up) dishes so they are a good size for small children. I only wish they made sippy tops for the cups. I would buy these again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot in this set for the price! The cups, bowls, and plates are the perfect size for my 3 year old and 6 year old. I love how there is multi colors. My boys love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bell

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for early baby to toddler to school age youngsters! I liked it so much I ended up buying two more for gifts. Always handy, dishwasher safe dishes that I never worry about breaking or damaging. These have held up well and the adults in the house grab them for a quick snack or meal. Can't miss with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Munchkin Feeding Set, 15 Pack
product_meta.description:
Munchkin’s 15 piece set of microwavable BPA-free plastic dinnerware makes dining more enjoyable for the little ones. Each mealtime set provides great value and includes 5 cups, 5 plates and 5 bowls. This bright and colorful feeding set has a fascinating fish pattern to add delight to any dish you prepare. The cups have a wide base to provide stability, helping to keep drinks in the cup and not on the floor. Perfect for little boys and girls 18 months and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Our 15 piece set of BPA free plastic dinnerware makes dining more enjoyable for the little ones. Each set provides great value and includes 5 cups, 5 plates and 5 bowls. This bright and colorful feeding set has a fascinating fish pattern to add delight to any dish you prepare. The cups have a wide base to provide stability, helping to keep drinks in the cup and not on the floor.
feature_bullets: 15 piece dinner set contains 5 cups, 5 plates and 5 bowls
Top rack dishwasher safe, microwave safe
Suitable for children 18 months and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars458 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
